Cardboard box as a DIY pet bed. Cut out a comfortable space for your pet to sleep and cover it with soft fabric.
Cardboard box as a fort or playhouse for kids. Cut out windows and doors and paint it to make it look like a real house.
Cardboard box as a storage unit for off-season clothing or shoes. Cut out compartments and hang hangers from the sides.
Cardboard box as a birdhouse or bird feeder. Cut out a small opening at the top and fill it with birdseed.
